titleStmt.title: Luthers predecessours: or an ansvvere to the question of the Papists: Where was your church before Luther?
titleStmt.author: Bedford, Thomas, d. 1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kingston for George Winder, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstons Church yard in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Emmanuel College (Cambridge University) Library.
